ComicInfo.Summary: As Chris Robinson announces his retirement from being Star, Horde assumes control of the Vicious Circle, much to the distress of Powerhouse, who quits the team. Dragon, who has discovered he is multi-lingual, returns home with a date, where he is attacked by Dung and Chaos & Control.

ComicInfo.Title: Duel With Dung
